level.heading: ISSUANCE AND DISPLAY OF LICENSE (ยง 17-2904)

level.text: The Director shall issue a license to a facility that the Director determines is in compliance with the Act and this chapter.
A licensee shall display the license and certificate of occupancy in a conspicuous place on the premises.

The Director shall issue a license only for the premises and person or persons named as applicants in the application. The license is not valid for use by any person or at any place other than that designated in the license. Any transfer as to ownership or location without the approval of the Director causes the immediate forfeiture of the license.
A license is the property of the District Government and shall be returned to the Director immediately upon any of the following events:
Suspension or revocation of the license;
